title: Milestone 1: Store Conversations
description: Automatically capture and store Claude Code conversations as Git Notes on commits. Notes sync with push/pull.

title: Fix e2e test: sync push not returning 'Pushed' in output

title: Validate Milestone 1 Store Conversations implementation

title: Create manual test plan for Milestone 1
